mapper.insert: insert into inquiryboard(title,userID, content, writeDate,modifiyDate) values (#{title}, #{userID}, #{content}, #{writeDate},#{writeDate})
mapper.select: select * from inquiryboard where userID = #{userID} or (select userState from yahtzee.member where userID=#{userID})=1 order by idx desc, writeDate desc limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize};
select count(*) from inquiryboard where content like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
